txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but the enemy has not given up. They still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'Karkas roams the High Knolls, smashing wherever he goes. Go there, and show him that Wildermore will endure!'
You have defeated Karkas, earning the trust of the people of Wildermore.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but the enemy persists throughout much of Wildermore.  Karkas smashes across the High Knolls in the shadow of Núrzum's might, crushing as he goes.
Karkas can be found stomping throughout the hills of the High Knolls.
You have defeated Karkas, earning the trust of the people of Wildermore.
